document.full_text: with at&t looking to again lay claim to being the nation's biggest cellphone carrier, will verizon wireless have to seek out a deal to keep up? not really.
document.title: for verizon, little cause to be worried by at&t deal
lines_and_colors: with at&t looking to again lay claim to being the nation's biggest cellphone carrier, will verizon wireless have to seek out a deal to keep up? not really.
